data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Kyustendil, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kyustendil, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,312 believers find a person of peace today among the 114,388 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Kyustendil.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kyustendil who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, I pray that the Tatar, Crimean people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Kyustendil, Bulgaria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Kyustendil hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kyustendil, Bulgaria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
